author: Anton Petrov
description:
Support this channel on Patreon to help me make this a full time job: https://www.patreon.com/whatdamath (Unreleased videos, extra footage, DMs, no ads)

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about the Escathian hypothesis by David Kipping
Links:
https://arxiv.org/pdf/2512.09970
https://www.youtube.com/@CoolWorldsLab/videos
Pulsar planet: https://youtu.be/lNUWQcqpu4U
Fermi paradox series playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL9hNFus3sjE7lB0sJRnGLWng0uIPxUVqG
Enjoy and please subscribe

0:00 Fermi paradox and Escathian hypothesis 
2:08 How we usually detect things in astronomy 
4:25 Parallels from human civilizations 
5:45 Counter argument - quiet aliens 
6:30 Vanishing human civilizations 
8:10 Rome and China - fuzzy signal example 
11:45 How li
title: Fermi Paradox and Escathian Hypothesis: Will We Only Find Dying Aliens?
